code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Outlet}from"react-router-dom";import Login from'./View/Login';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[isLogin,setIsLogin]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const loginData=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('loginDetails'));if(!(loginData&&loginData.loginStatus)){const loginDetails={loginStatus:false};localStorage.setItem('loginDetails',JSON.stringify(loginDetails));}else{setIsLogin(true);}},[isLogin]);function checkLogin(status){setIsLogin(status);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:isLogin?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Outlet,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{checkLogin:checkLogin})});};export default App;
